Service Details: - Provides opportunities for children and youth to reach their full potential by ensuring they are engaged in learning, connected and involved in their communities, and have emotional and physical well-being- Provides opportunities for people to move out of poverty and thrive by ensuring that people have access to safe and affordable housing, nutrition and food security and employment and financial stability- Supports people and communities to be healthy and strong so they are able to respond to both challenges and opportunities by strengthening connections to supports, neighbourhood and community engagement and personal well-being and safety
Address & Map: 1456 St Paul St, #202Kelowna, BC     V1Y 2E6View MapQuest Map
Major Intersection: St Paul St and Bernard Ave
